subject: Remittance Advice - Payment Dec 2024
body:
Please find attached our remittance advice for payment of $45,230.50 covering invoices INV-2024-10001 and INV-2024-10002. Payment sent via ACH on 12/01/2024.

Regards,
Amazon AP Team

subject: Oracle Corporation - Payment Notification
body:
Dear Meeru Accounts Receivable,

This is to confirm that we have initiated an ACH payment of $15,340.25 for the following invoices:
- INV-2024-10011: $10,240.25
- INV-2024-10012: $5,100.00

Please confirm receipt.

Best regards,
Oracle Accounts Payable

subject: Payment - December 2024 (Discount Applied)
body:
Hi,

We have processed payment for invoice INV-2024-10020. Please note we have applied our standard 2% early payment discount per our contract terms (Section 4.2).

Original amount: $13,250.00
Discount (2%): -$500.00 (approx)
Payment amount: $12,750.00

Please update your records accordingly.

Thanks,
Zoom Finance Team

subject: Wire Transfer Confirmation
body:
To whom it may concern,

Please be advised that a wire transfer of $5,600.00 has been sent to your account for outstanding balance. Reference: PO-44521.

If you have any questions, please contact our AP department.

Shopify Inc
Accounts Payable

subject: HubSpot - Consolidated Payment Advice
body:
Automated Payment Notification

Payment has been processed from HubSpot Inc (Parent Entity) covering invoices across subsidiary accounts.

Total Payment: $33,450.75

Breakdown:
- HubSpot Inc (Marketing): INV-2024-10024 - $18,200.75
- HubSpot Inc (CRM): INV-2024-10025 - $15,250.00

Please see attached for full details.

subject: EFT Payment Confirmation - Invoice INV-2024-10030
body:
Dear Meeru Team,

We confirm that an EFT payment of $28,400.00 has been initiated for invoice INV-2024-10030 (Monitoring & Observability Suite).

Expected settlement: 12/10/2024

Thank you,
Datadog Accounts Payable

subject: Uber Technologies - Payment for INV-2024-10036
body:
Hello,

Payment of $42,300.00 has been sent via ACH for invoice INV-2024-10036 (Ride Analytics Dashboard).

Thank you for your services.

Best,
Uber Treasury Department

subject: Workday Payment Advice - December
body:
Remittance Advice

Company: Workday Inc
Payment Method: ACH
Payment Amount: $38,900.50

This payment includes a credit adjustment of $3,100.50 per contract amendment CA-2024-112.

Net invoices covered under this payment will be detailed in the attached PDF.

subject: Automated Payment Notification - Palantir Technologies
body:
This is an automated notification.

Palantir Technologies Inc has processed a payment of $19,800.00.

Reference: INV-2024-10027
Payment Date: 2024-12-08

Note: This payment includes coverage for all outstanding balances including billing adjustments.

Do not reply to this email.

subject: ServiceNow - ACH Payment Sent
body:
Dear Vendor,

We have submitted an ACH payment for the following:

Invoice: INV-2024-10017
Amount: $21,450.00
Payment Date: 12/04/2024
ACH Trace: 2024120400987

Please allow 1-2 business days for settlement.

ServiceNow Accounts Payable
